abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "BasisOfRecord is Specimen", "Country is Mexico", "MediaType is Image", "TaxonKey is Solanum L." ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Moscow University Herbarium (MW) 1 records from OBI - Robert F. Hoover Herbarium, Cal Poly State University 1 records from Herbarium GB, University of Gothenburg 1 records from University of Lethbridge Herbarium (LEA) 1 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Botany) - Historical Photographs of Type Specimens from Berlin (B) 2 records from University of South Carolina, A. C. Moore Herbarium 2 records from Capture of Primary Biodiversity Data for West African Plants 3 records from LOB - California State University, Long Beach Herbarium 3 records from SFV - California State University, Northridge 4 records from Herbarium Senckenbergianum (FR) 5 records from Botany Division, Yale Peabody Museum 5 records from Bell Museum plants 6 records from University of Florida Herbarium (FLAS) 6 records from University of Vienna, Institute for Botany - Herbarium WU 8 records from University of Jena, Herbarium Haussknecht - Herbarium JE 8 records from Carnegie Museum of Natural History Herbarium 8 records from Charles University Prague - Herbarium PRC 9 records from CAS Botany (BOT) 9 records from SJSU - Carl W. Sharsmith Herbarium, San Jose State University 10 records from CSIC-Real Jardín Botánico-Colección de Plantas Vasculares (MA) 10 records from Herbarium Hamburgense 10 records from SDSU - San Diego State University Herbarium 11 records from SD - SD Herbarium, San Diego Natural History Museum 11 records from The Vascular Plants Collection of the University of Goettingen 12 records from RB - Rio de Janeiro Botanical Garden Herbarium Collection 19 records from University of New Mexico Herbarium 21 records from The Vascular Plant Collection at the Botanische Staatssammlung München 25 records from Herbarium Berolinense, Berlin (B) 25 records from Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh Herbarium (E) 25 records from Intermountain Herbarium (Vascular plants & algae) 45 records from Desert Botanical Garden Herbarium 50 records from University of Michigan Herbarium 57 records from Harvard University Herbaria: All Records 59 records from Natural History Museum, Vienna - Herbarium W 63 records from RSA - California Botanic Garden Herbarium 82 records from Meise Botanic Garden Herbarium (BR) 83 records from Tropicos Specimen Data 130 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Botany) Seed Plant Collection 140 records from University of Colorado Museum of Natural History Herbarium Vascular Plant Collection 142 records from University of South Florida Herbarium (USF) 142 records from University of Vermont, Pringle Herbarium 231 records from Arizona State University Vascular Plant Herbarium 236 records from NMNH Extant Specimen Records 237 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Botany 743 records from Natural History Museum (London) Collection Specimens 916 records from The vascular plants collection (P) at the Herbarium of the Muséum national d'Histoire Naturelle (MNHN - Paris) 1354 records from Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew - Herbarium Specimens 2499 records from The New York Botanical Garden Herbarium (NY)
